citeinfo.origin: University of Alaska Fairbanks (UAF), School of Fisheries and Ocean Sciences (SFOS), Institute of Marine Science (IMS)
citeinfo.title: Conference on Shared Living Resources of the Bering Sea Region

descript.abstract: In these conference proceedings, you will find an impressive amount of knowledge and insight into the legal, administrative and ecological complexities of the area called "Beringia" This conference commenced at an auspicious time for a region so long veiled by the "ice curtain"ﾅimmediately following discussion at the June, 1990 summit By Presidents George Bush and Mikhail Gorbachev about this shared northern borderﾅtheir announcement of an international park encompassing of concern about depletion of fish stocks in the Central Bering Sea and their call for Development of an international regime for the conservation and management of the living marines resources in that critical and currently unregulated area.
descript.purpose: A report explaining the conference on Shared Living resources of the Bering Sea region
